title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
purpose: To drive change by raising awareness of Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) amongst parliamentarians, policy-makers and the public, to increase recognition of PCOS as a complex, lifelong condition, generating policy solutions to improve the lives of those living with PCOS.
